Table.Name: MA_Storages
Table.Overview: This table contains the inventory storages data.

Fields.Column: The univocal code that identifies the storage.
Storage description.
The possible storage grouping which the current storage referts to.
Storage type.
This field serves to show if the goods contained in the present storage are property of the company.
Storage address.
Storage ZIP code.
Storage city.
Storage county.
Storage country.
Storage telephone 1.
Storage telephone 2.
Storage fax.
Descriptive text.
It indicates if the storage is disabled.
It indicates the priority associated to the storage to establish the order of search of the availability of the materials during the generation of the Material Picking.
It indicates that the storage will be considered during the search of availability for the picking for production.
If enabled, the storage is considered by the MRP algorithm when it calculates the book inventory for a particular item.
Field for internal use.
If the link storage-location is enabled, it indicates that the storage uses location.
Storage tax journal sales. If it is present, it is proposed in sale documents.
Storage tax journal purchases. If it is present, it is proposed in purchase documents.
Storage stub book sales. If it is present, it is proposed in sale documents.
Storage stub book purchases. If it is present, it is proposed in purchase documents.
Stub book of interstorage movement document IN. If it is present, it is proposed in interstorage movement document IN.
Stub book of interstorage movement document OUT. If it is present, it is proposed in interstorage movement document OUT.
Storage stub book adjustment. If it is present, it is proposed in adjustment documents.
It indicates if the storage is used for retail activities. Field managed only by the country: RO.
It allows deciding if receive a warning, a block or nothing in case the availability of item recalled in the inventory entries issued for this storage is not sufficient.
It allows deciding if receive a warning, a block or nothing in case the availability of item recalled in the sale document issued for this storage is not sufficient.
It allows deciding if receive a warning, a block or nothing in case the availability of item recalled in the sales orders issued for this storage is not sufficient.
It allows deciding if receive a warning, a block or nothing in case of item scarcity in inventory entries issued for this storage.
It allows deciding if receive a warning, a block or nothing in case of item scarcity in sales documents issued for this storage.
It indicates if in the current storage the WMS is enabled.
Goods Receipt Zone used in WMS. It is enabled if the field MA_Storages.TwoStepsPutaway is true.
Goods Issue Zone used in WMS.
It indicates if in the current storage the two step putaway is activated. It is used in WMS.
Return Zone used in WMS.
Scrap Zone used in WMS.
Inspection Zone used in WMS.
Search Zone Strategy Putaway used in WMS.
Search Zone Strategy Picking used in WMS.
Stock Return Strategy used in WMS.
It indicates that the Manufacturing Two Steps Putaway is enabled. It is actived if the link between WMS and Manufacturing is enabled.
Manufacturing Receipt Zone for WMS. It is actived if the link between WMS and Manufacturing is enabled.
Manufacturing Issue Zone for WMS. It is actived if the link between WMS and Manufacturing is enabled.
WMS Activation Date.
WMS Manufacturing Activation Date.
Storage Barcode Prefix.
Last Snapshot Certified Date.
It indicates if in the current storage the cross docking management is activated.
Cross Docking Zone used in WMS. This field is enabled if the field MA_Storages.CrossDocking is true.
Storage Replenishment used in WMS.
Specificator Type Replenishment used in WMS.
Specificator Replenishment used in WMS.
It indicates if in the current storage the consignment stock is activated. It used in WMS.
ISO country code. It is automatically set by the program according to the Company master date (field MA_Company.ISOCountryCode) but it can be modified by the user.
Additional storage address.
Street number. Field managed only by the country BR.
District. Field managed only by the country BR.
Federal state code. Field managed only by the country BR.
